vs_addition.command.fake_air_pocket.add:
Added a fake air pocket from (%1$s, %2$s, %3$s) to (%4$s, %5$s, %6$s)!
 Ship ID: %7$s
 Pocket ID: %8$s
vs_addition.command.fake_air_pocket.remo:
Removed the fake air pocket!
 Ship ID: %1$s
 Pocket ID: %2$s
vs_addition.command.fake_air_pocket.exte:
Extended the fake air pocket %1$s block(s) on the %2$s side!
 Ship ID: %3$s
 Pocket ID: %4$s
vs_addition.command.fake_air_pocket.get:
Got a fake air pocket from (%1$s, %2$s, %3$s) to (%4$s, %5$s, %6$s)!
 Pocket ID: %7$s
vs_addition.error.text1: An error occurred. Please report it at %s
